column5: Feel like a local! Conveniently located near downtown Dallas. Experience Dallas' some top-rated favorites such as, Garden Cafe, Sugar Bacon, along with many other must-visit places. Only 2.5 miles to downtown. Fresh 1 bdrm / 1 bath apartment, with full kitchen, living & dining areas, accompanied with a quaint courtyard. Direct access to public transportation. Don't have the dates you need? Check out: https://www.airbnb.com/manage-your-space/12274983
